name: macroforge
description: TypeScript macro expansion engine powered by Rust and SWC
author: macroforge contributors

scripts.build:serde: bun build js/serde/index.ts --outfile js/serde/index.mjs && bun x tsc js/serde/index.ts --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir js/serde --lib ES2024 --skipLibCheck
scripts.build:utils: bun build js/utils/index.ts --outfile js/utils/index.mjs --external @rydshift/mirror && bun x tsc js/utils/index.ts --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir js/utils --lib ES2024 --module ESNext --moduleResolution bundler --skipLibCheck
scripts.build:traits: bun build js/traits/index.ts --outfile js/traits/index.mjs && bun x tsc js/traits/index.ts --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir js/traits --lib ES2024 --skipLibCheck
scripts.build:js: npm run build:serde && npm run build:utils && npm run build:traits
scripts.build: npm install && npm run build:js && bun x napi build --platform --release
scripts.cleanbuild: npm run clean && npm run build
